alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:44PM CDT until May 19 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hillsboro around 350 PM CDT. Cedar Hill Lakes and Dittmer around 355 PM CDT. Cedar Hill around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Antonia, House Springs, Byrnes Mill, Barnhart, Imperial, High Ridge, Arnold and Murphy. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 185 and 191. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site and Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for east central Missouri.
